import React from 'react' export const Header = () => { var offcanvasElementList = [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('.offcanvas')) var offcanvasList = offcanvasElementList.map(function (offcanvasEl) { return new bootstrap.Offcanvas(offcanvasEl) }) return (
